subject: Baseball
Gambling
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: While 30 major league teams convene inside the Bellagio with hopes of bolstering their championship hopes, some simple numbers will inform them of just how close they may be to winning it all.
snippet: While 30 major league teams convene inside the Bellagio with hopes of bolstering their championship hopes, some simple numbers will inform them of just how close they may be to winning it all.
